select te.id as 'id', te.class_id as 'class_id', tc.title as 'class_title', tc.category as 'class_category', tt.name as 'teacher_name', tp.created_at as 'pay_created_at' from tbl_enrollments as te inner join tbl_class as tc on te.class_id = tc.id inner join tbl_teacher as tt on tc.teacher_id = tt.id inner join tbl_pay as tp on te.pay_id = tp.id where te.member_id = #{member_id}

tc.title ASC
